As the sun rises, Sarah, a health-conscious individual in her thirties, wakes up feeling refreshed. She begins her day with a glass of water infused with lemon, a practice she has adopted to kickstart her metabolism. After a brief meditation session, she prepares a nutritious breakfast, opting for oatmeal topped with fresh berries and a sprinkle of chia seeds. 

Before heading out, she recalls her recent interest in nutrition response testing. Intrigued by the concept, Sarah searches online for “nutrition response testing near me.” This method of testing is designed to evaluate how the body responds to various nutrients and dietary changes.
